messages.content: Pippa's campaign is picking up support from every corner of South East Cambridgeshire. The strong voice our area needs to defend our shared values.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pippa will do whatever it takes to put an end to Brexit and keep Britain open, tolerant and prosperous.
Climate expert Pippa will push for bold action to protect and enhance our environment.
Pippa will lift our schools and hospitals off their knees with much-needed extra funding, to ensure all residents have access to first-class healthcare and education.

mentions.candidate: Pippa is different. She isn’t a career politician. She’s in this fight to deliver real change for people living in every corner of our community.

issues.brexitEurope: Pippa will do whatever it takes to put an end to Brexit and keep Britain open, tolerant and prosperous.
issues.education: Pippa will lift our schools off their knees with much-needed extra funding, to ensure all residents have access to first-class education.
issues.environment: Climate expert Pippa will push for bold action to protect and enhance our environment.
issues.health: Pippa will lift our hospitals off their knees with much-needed extra funding, to ensure all residents have access to first-class healthcare.

images.caption: Pippa is winning widespread support for her positive plan for South East Cambs

examples: October poll puts Lib Dems in frame: Con 42%, Lib Dem 31%, Lab 16%, Others
